named-query.name: READ_FULLFILLMENT_GROUPS_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT fullfillmentGroup FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.FullfillmentGroup fullfillmentGroup WHERE fullfillmentGroup.orderId = :orderId

named-query.name: READ_DEFAULT_FULLFILLMENT_GROUP_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT defaultFullfillmentGroup FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.DefaultFullfillmentGroup defaultFullfillmentGroup WHERE defaultFullfillmentGroup.orderId = :orderId
